Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Reroute at Cicero/Washington
ShortDescription: #54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, Chicago, Laramie, Madison and Cicero, due to street blockage near Cicero/Washington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, Chicago, Laramie, Madison, then resume their normal route on Cicero, due to street blockage near Cicero/Washington.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #72 North Ave Temporary Eastbound Reroute near North Avenue and Clark
ShortDescription: Eastbound #72 North Ave buses are temporarily rerouted due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach near North Avenue and Clark.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

At the request of Police, due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach, Eastbound #72 North Ave buses will only provide service up to North Avenue and Clark.

Please allow extra travel time.
